abstract: The company says that its device, unlike the Amazon Kindle, will primarily be aimed at businesspeople.
snippet: The company says that its device, unlike the Amazon Kindle, will primarily be aimed at businesspeople.
lead_paragraph: One of the coming competitors to the Amazon Kindle revealed a little bit more about itself here at the D: All Things Digital conference, run by The Wall Street Journal. Plastic Logic, a 10-year-old company founded by two Cambridge University professors, is working on devices with E Ink reading screens on thin, flexible plastic displays.

headline.main: Plastic Logic, Maker of Thin Reader Device, Peeks Out
